raw_data.title: Program Manager
raw_data.description: Acts as contractor’s representative with the Government Contracting Officer (GCO). Responsible for ensuring that all contractual matters are in compliance with all federal and state laws. Determines contract requirements and designates the Site Project Managers. Reviews all material lists to ensure timely and accurate material ordering and delivery. Ensures all tasks are fully manned with the proper mix of trade skills. Meets periodically with government representatives to assess the progress of a project. Must be thoroughly familiar with Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) safety rules and regulations. Conducts feasibility studies; reviews contractual requirements for compliance; responsible for the day-to-day management of the program; liaisons with customers to review reports and procedures; reviews financial and budgetary documents to ensure that the project remains within budget; and reports directly to the President.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

labor_categories.years_experience: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

raw_data.title: IT Design Engineer
raw_data.description: Responsibilities include performing a variety of network engineering tasks, either independently or under limited supervision. Designs telecommunication networks for commercial and military customers. Analyzes configurations and develops feasibility studies and provides recommendations for updating systems to meet modern technologies.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

labor_categories.years_experience: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

raw_data.title: IT Senior Engineer
raw_data.description: Under general supervision, defines and executes systems engineering activities within a project. Must be experienced in telecommunication central office switch configuration or  WAN/Internet network design or configuration. Responsible for system planning, performance management, capacity planning, testing and validation, benchmarking, information engineering, and development staffing of a systems engineering management plan.

raw_data.title: IT Network Engineer
raw_data.description: Performs assigned tasks with some latitude for non-reviewed actions and decisions. Provides input for system planning, performance management, capacity planning, testing, and validation of networks.

raw_data.title: IT Network Technician
raw_data.description: Responsible for performing preventive and operational maintenance on-premise switches, and capable of performing minor troubleshooting and recommending restoral actions.

raw_data.title: Senior Systems Analyst
raw_data.description: Supervises the overall integration, installation, and testing of installed network systems and certifies them as operational. Must have the ability to troubleshoot network system software/hardware problems and provide remedial actions.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education). Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification.

labor_categories.years_experience: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education). Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification.

raw_data.title: Systems Analyst II
raw_data.description: Troubleshoot network systems and provides remedial actions to restore to full operational capability. Provides hotline support to customers. Has the ability to adapt to new situations, technologies, and environments.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification

labor_categories.years_experience: Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification

raw_data.title: Senior Installation Technician
raw_data.description: Supervise installation crews in network installations. Maintains status and/or progress reports, cost reports, technical presentations, and provides the design department with accurate as-built drawings, administration documentation, and test results for final delivery to the customer.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification

labor_categories.years_experience: Formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute CNE certification

raw_data.title: Junior Installation Technician
raw_data.description: Supervise installation labor crews in network installations. Maintains status and/or progress reports, cost reports, technical drawings, administration documentation, and test results for final delivery to the customer.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Sufficient formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute BICSI certification

labor_categories.years_experience: Sufficient formal training in Network Systems Operations to substitute BICSI certification

raw_data.title: Quality Control Specialist
raw_data.description:
Establish processes or procedures for evaluating systems and applicable documents to ensure total compliance with the contract. Conducts quality assurance inspections on material received and stored in accordance with the contract Bill of Materials. Maintains all quality assurance records and files in accordance with ISO 9001. Reviews all contracts and tasking orders and assists in the development of the Bill of Materials. Reviews all material receipts and compliance statements in accordance with specifications and standards. Reviews all inventory inspection results to ensure proper adherence to
contract or task order requirements
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Sufficient experience and formal training to substitute formal training in Quality Control (ISO 9001).

labor_categories.years_experience: Sufficient experience and formal training to substitute formal training in Quality Control (ISO 9001).

raw_data.title: Technical Writer/Editor
raw_data.description:
Responsible for developing and editing all documents originating from the
Contractor's office ensuring conformance to standards for grammar and technical content. Develop technical
reference materials in accordance with the required specifications and standards. Assists in collecting and organizing information required for the preparation of user manuals, training materials, installation guides, proposals, and other reports and deliverables.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

labor_categories.years_experience: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

raw_data.title: Web Designer
raw_data.description: Ability to provide visual communication of ideas or activities with clarity using graphics and language, multimedia production, web application programming and publishing, interactivity, and usability testing. Proven Design Skills, Development Skills, and Optimization.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

labor_categories.years_experience: 2 years of experience = 1 year of college (total 8 years of experience to substitute education)

raw_data.title: Draftsman
raw_data.description: Develops network engineering drawings using computer-based drawing packages. Must be familiar with current automatic computer-aided design software packages and have a thorough working knowledge of blueprints and drawings relative to network design. Must have the ability to interpret and apply engineering drawing symbols. Must have the ability to develop block diagrams, floor plans, and logic flow charts.
raw_data.education_and_experience_substitution: Formal training can be substituted commensurate with job experience.
raw_data.required_certifications_or_licenses:
Formal training in
engineering software packages

labor_categories.years_experience: Formal training can be substituted commensurate with job experience.

raw_data.title: Administrative Support
raw_data.description: Provide administrative-type support to technical and management-level personnel. This includes, but is not limited to, documentation preparation and support, project administration, general office support, executive secretarial support, human resource planning, event planning and administration, office relocation planning, and other duties as may be assigned.
